title: Bug 117981: Unable to select items in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: I am unable to select any item in the library outline view on the first attempt. Instead, I need to make a second attempt to successfully select the item.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.

OB: I am unable to select the label item on the first attempt.

EB: The label item should be selectable on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
4. Verify that the label item cannot be selected on the first attempt.
5. Make a second attempt to select the label item and verify that it can be selected successfully.
